meanings.definition: (ラテン語) 投げ返す, 拒絶する, 追い払う

examples.translation: 私はその件を拒絶する。

verb_forms.present_indicative: reiciō, reicis, reicit, reicimus, reicitis, reiciunt
verb_forms.imperfect_indicative: reiciēbam, reiciēbās, reiciēbat, reiciēbāmus, reiciēbātis, reiciēbant
verb_forms.future_indicative: reiciam, reiciēs, reiciet, reiciēmus, reiciētis, reicient
verb_forms.perfect_indicative: reiecī, reiecistī, reiecit, reiecimus, reiecistis, reiecērunt
verb_forms.pluperfect_indicative: reieceram, reiecerās, reiecerat, reiecerāmus, reiecerātis, reiecerant
verb_forms.future_perfect_indicative: reiecerō, reieceris, reiecerit, reiecerimus, reieceritis, reiecerint
verb_forms.present_subjunctive: reiciam, reiciās, reiciat, reiciāmus, reiciātis, reiciant
verb_forms.imperfect_subjunctive: reicerem, reicerēs, reiceret, reicerēmus, reicerētis, reicerent
verb_forms.perfect_subjunctive: reiecerim, reieceris, reiecerit, reiecerimus, reieceritis, reiecerint
verb_forms.pluperfect_subjunctive: reiecissem, reiecissēs, reiecisset, reiecissēmus, reiecissētis, reiecissent
